f_dist.description: Fitness distribution of target layer. Numpy histogram (https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.histogram.html) with 100 bins of the range 0.0 to 1.0.

e_dist.description: Evolvability distribution of target layer. Numpy histogram (https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.histogram.html) with 100 bins of the range 0.0 to 1.0.

efficiency.description: The efficiency of the gene pool. See docs for the definition of efficiency.

pgc_evolutions.description: The total number of evolutions of pGC's.

target_evolutions.description: The total number of evolutions of target individuals.

pgc_reuse_max.description: The maximum number of layers any one pGC is reused in (excluding the random pGC).

pgc_reuse_avg.description: The mean number of layers a pGC is reused in (excluding the random pGC).

sgc_reuse_max.description: The maximum number of reuses of a non-codon sub-GC.

sgc_reuse_avg.description: The mean number of reuses of a non-codon sub-GC.

worker_id.description: The ID of the worker writing this row.

created.description: The time at which the layer statistics were calculated. This is the end of the target layer epoch.
